data.text:
We found this hotel to be very clean &very well kept rooms are decorated beautifully all very clean our stay was very very good we couldn’t have asked for more staff were excellent very welcoming especially Besso he was there to see we had wat we needed & more couldn’t do enough for us . 
George was our man in restaurant he was tremendous brought us our breakfast every morning such a good waiter & he was there every meal time went out of his way for us to ensure we enjoyed our experience!! 
Then we had another George who was behind main bar a lovely young man he too ensured we were served wat we wanted & was helpful in every way ,, 
We went to celebrate our wedding anniversary and we enjoyed it 8 then some. 
Food was fantastic 
Staff fantastic every one who works there have a smile &a welcoming from reception to gardening staff would recommend this hotel to anyone fantastic thank you to all at dreams hotel !!
data.title: Hotel dreams beach  5*

data.text: This was my first solo trip so was a little apprehensive. From the moment I got into the hotel I was met by friendly faces. As I had got there in the evening 9.40pm and dinner service was about to finish.  I was told to leave my cases and to go into get some dinner and I could check in after. My room was spacious, clean and comfortable. It was lovely to see bottled water in the fridge and tea and coffee was stocked well. The room was cleaned daily and the guy cleaning it was lovely and helpful and always left a lovely design with the bedding. If I saw him in the morning he would always ask if I needed anything else and always left extra water in the room for me. I had a lovely garden and sea view room 1608 and was away from entertainment so was relatively quiet. The pool area was quiet in the mornings but much busier in the afternoons as I quickly realised this was due to other travellers coming up from the beach as the sun had gone down however there were more than enough sun beds to cater for this. As a first time solo traveller I was made to feel very comfortable especially when dining. I was greeted personally each day in the dining hall by Besso (food and beverage manager),  George, Mina and was always asked if I was enjoying my meal and could they get me anything. On my last day when the wrist bands were taken off at noon, I wasn’t being picked up until 3.45pm and sat in the main reception I was approached by Besso and asked if I wanted some lunch or a drink. As I declined he insisted I have something and brought me some fruit and tea into the reception which I know he didn’t need to do this. This for me speaks volumes! I have stayed in a lot of hotels and I really couldn’t fault the staff at this hotel. I was met by smiles all week. The food was varied and plentiful. I personally loved the variety of salads with everything for everyone. I’m not a pastry  person however at breakfast there was the largest choice I have ever seen and even I was tempted!! The only downside was the amount of Russians and they can be very rude to the staff which annoyed me but I imagine this is in all around Egypt! I signed up to the 3 day Spa and enjoyed the sessions however you do need to let the receptionist know what you expect I.e. deep tissue, relaxing massage as the masseuse don’t speak English well. I did this on my 3rd occasion snd had a fab massage as requested. I also went on a day boat trip and had the best day snorkelling and diving which was magnificent and would highly recommend. The guides were great and made the day during the trip fun and everyone was included! Would definitely recommend and look forward to returning again
data.title: Fantastic Solo holiday with a great hotel.

data.text: Dreams Beach, SHARM SHARM SHARM EL SHEIKH! Number 1, Animation, One Nation Team!!! Excellent, the guys are all so cool, great entertainment around the pool, for all ages and great shows in the evening, shout out to Mohamed, Danik, Noor, Ganya, Sayed!! Much Love x
data.title: Fantastic all inclusive resort

data.text:
The food is terrible, most of the staff speaks Russian but not English.
The staff at the restaurant is very rude. 
We checked in at 22 pm and asked where we could get something to eat and we were told we could get a snack around midnight at the restaurant. 
We were left starving of course. 
I received a letter in my room for my birthday saying that they had prepared a cake for me (even though I didn’t notify the reception that it was my birthday) and when I gave this letter to the restaurant manager he gave me a dirty look and he served the cakes by just chucking it on the table like I was a dog.
We didn’t feel very welcome and the hotel is not really recommended for families or if you’re not Russian. 
We asked for a late checkout as our flight was at 9pm and we were told okay at the beginning but then they made us checkout at 12pm and cut our wristbands saying that we could still have lunch and get drinks.. of course we have been stopped and questioned at the restaurant like we were intruders at lunch time. 
We also signed up for 3 days spa with all the benefits of sauna, steam room and jacuzzi but we were given just the massage and kicked out afterwards. 
This hotel is to avoid at all the costs
data.title: Very bad experience

data.text: The hotel exceeded my expectations: cozy rooms, excellent service and excellent location. An impressive choice of breakfast and friendly staff made my stay unforgettable. I definitely recommend. Thanks to the cleanliness and comfort of the rooms, as well as the beautiful view from the window, I felt at home. Higher-level service: staff is attentive to every part and is always ready to help. This hotel - and
data.title: Good review
